attributes.action: Benefits Families receive should be capped at Child 3
attributes.additional_details:
We want the Government to stop paying families extra Child benefits, Tax Credits & any other benefits after Child number 3.

This will allow the Government to free up cash to be used on more current  issues like reducing our debt, better Education, improving the NHS, restore Police numbers, tighten our Border Controls  & many other ways where our funds are needed urgently  to operate & run our great country.
